original_text: but there is a God in heaven who reveals mysteries, and he has made known to King Nebuchadnezzar what will be in the latter days. Your dream and the visions of your head as you lay in bed are these:
korean_text: 오직 은밀한 것을 나타내실 이는 하늘에 계신 하나님이시라 그가 느부갓네살 왕에게 후일에 될 일을 알게 하셨나이다 왕의 꿈 곧 왕이 침상에서 머리 속으로 받은 환상은 이러하니이다

sentences.original_text: but there is a God in heaven
and he has made known to King Nebuchadnezzar
what will be in the latter days
Your dream and the visions of your head

sentences.korean_translation: 침상에 누워 있을 때 본 것들이
